content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for visiting the apartment, Emilia. I am glad to hear that you are interested in renting it. As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible price for my property. May I ask what kind of price range you have in mind for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible price. I am willing to negotiate with you. How about 600 Euros?

I am a student and I am very responsible, so I am confident that I will take care of the apartment well. I am also very dependable, so I am sure that I will pay the rent on time every month. I would like to have a good relationship with you as my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must say that 600 Euros per month is quite low for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim. As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting a fair price for my property. However, I am open to discussing possible ways to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 500 Euros. I am willing to pay more if you are willing to lower the price.

I am a student and I am very responsible, so I am confident that I will take care of the apartment well. I am also very dependable, so I am sure that I will pay the rent on time every month. I would like to have a good relationship with you as my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I am also open to discussing possible ways to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. For example, I am willing to sign a longer lease agreement in exchange for a lower price. Or, I am willing to pay a security deposit in advance to show that I am a responsible tenant.

Please let me know what you think.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your offer, Emilia. While 500 Euros per month is still quite low for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am open to discussing possible ways to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

One possibility could be for you to sign a longer lease agreement in exchange for a lower price. This would provide me with more stability in terms of rental income, which could be beneficial for me as a landlord. Additionally, I am open to the idea of you paying a security deposit in advance to show that you are a responsible tenant.

With that being said, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price takes into account the market value of similar apartments in Mannheim, as well as the fact that you are a student who will be living in the apartment for an extended period of time. I believe that this price is fair and reasonable, and I hope that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

What do you think about this proposal, Emilia?
name: Heinrich Heine
